newFeatures.name: Editor: Inline Color Picker
newFeatures.description: When the cursor is on a hex, rgb() or hsl() color, you can use Ctrl-E or ⌘E to edit the color inline.

newFeatures.name: Editor: Indentation Preferences
newFeatures.description: Toggle between indenting with tabs or spaces and set the indentation size from the status bar.

newFeatures.name: Editor: New Code Editing Commands
newFeatures.description: Use Ctrl-Shift-/ or ⌘⇧/ to toggle block comments and Ctrl-Shift-D or ⌘⇧D to delete lines.

newFeatures.name: Editor: Code Hints for Relative URLs
newFeatures.description: While typing an href or src attribute in HTML, code hints show you relative paths for files on disk.

newFeatures.name: Editor: Incremental Find
newFeatures.description: The editor now highlights the first matching result when typing in the Find dialog.

newFeatures.name: Editor: Improved Quick Open
newFeatures.description: Quick Open now searches on the whole path (not just filename), and accepts CamelCase abbreviations and other non-contiguous matches.

newFeatures.name: Live Preview: CSS Highlighting
newFeatures.description: While Live Preview is active, putting the cursor in a rule in a CSS file highlights items affected by that rule in the browser.

newFeatures.name: Live Preview: Auto Reload
newFeatures.description: Live Preview now reloads the browser when saving non-CSS files.

newFeatures.name: Live Preview: Local Server Support
newFeatures.description: You can now use Live Preview with server-based content by specifying a base URL in Project Settings.

newFeatures.name: Sidebar: Find in File or Folder
newFeatures.description: Search in a specific file or folder by choosing "Find in…" from the context menu in the file tree.

newFeatures.name: Sidebar: File Tree Improvements
newFeatures.description: You can now create new folders and rename files or folders from the file tree context menu, and highlight the current file in the file tree using Navigate > Show in File Tree.

newFeatures.name: Sidebar: Working Set Sorting and Reordering
newFeatures.description: Sort by name, type or time added by choosing an option from the context menu. Also, the working set may be reordered using drag and drop.

newFeatures.name: UI: Status Bar
newFeatures.description: Displays cursor info, file size, file type, JSLint notification, and indentation preferences.

newFeatures.name: UI: Resizable Bottom Panels
newFeatures.description: Search Results and JSLint panels can now resize vertically.

newFeatures.name: Extensions: Per-User Storage
newFeatures.description: Extensions are now stored in per-user folders instead of inside the application folder. Windows: C:\Users\<user>\AppData\Roaming\Adobe\Edge Code\extensions. Mac: /Users/<user>/Library/Application Support/Adobe/Edge Code/extensions.
